name: Diesel - Disciple - Toro
additionalNotes: The Diesel Disciple was created by master blender AJ Fernandez and Justin Andrews, Dieselâ€™s Brand Manager. It is a full-bodied smoke with a dark chocolatey Mexican San Andres wrapper that expertly covers an Ecuadorian Sumatra binder and a Nicaraguan Habano filler. This specially selected three-nation blend offers a mesmerizing smoking experience with its complexity of flavors. The cigars are handmade in Nicaragua.
